title: How to make a trending small business enterprise at home in 2020 - Quora

response.answer_text: I started with my online business and got this product for sale. GREEN TEA LEMON WITH L-CARNITINE AND WITH ORGANIC BARLEY GRASS POWDER. The best way to move towards achieving your dream, is to eliminate the things that delay you or weigh you down. Green tea and zest of lemon flavor, altogether mixed with L-carnitine which aids in increasing your metabolism, triggering reduction of body fat and bringing you many steps further towards your weight goal.  WHAT IS L-CARNITINE? L-Carnitine regulates fat burning in the body by transporting it into the mitochondria and turning it into energy. Fat cannot be burned unless it passes through, regardless if you exercise or diet. L-Carnitine also ensures a successful weight loss and aids in rapid muscles recovery after an intense workout.
